response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and is worth $1,200,000 to you, just as it does to me. I am extending to you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,100,000.

This exceptional offer is exclusive to you, and I trust it reflects my commitment to ensuring you have the best possible experience with this product. I believe in making dreams come true, and I am confident that this offer will allow us both to achieve that goal.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours. If you decide to take advantage of this opportunity, I will arrange for immediate delivery and provide all necessary support to ensure a seamless transition into your possession.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
